name: Spoon Escape
description:
You and your friend have done some serious sh*t and now both of you are trapped here... and only one can escape! 

Use your not-so-useless spoon to dig your way out and get Power-Ups to be the one who doesn't get caught by the only cop in the prison.

Now you can finally play alone or with a friend in our two gamemodes! Beat your score improving your skills or compete with your friend hand in hand to see who is the one who escapes.

We are a small team of four students on our first year of learning game development. This game was made on a 48h gamejam with prisons as the main theme. It was our first gamejam and we won it! But the most important part is that it was an awesome experience and we can't wait for the next one. We are very passionate about what we do and we'd love to hear your opinion!

You can find us here! 

 

Feel free to email us at: firsttrystudios@gmail.com
